knimeNode.name: Service Variable Input
knimeNode.shortDescription: Injects flow variables to the workflow.

fullDescription.intro: This node allows injecting flow variables from outside of the workflow, e.g. via the advanced batch executor,a server-exposed workflow or the call workflow(local/remote) nodes.
fullDescription.option: A unique name for the input parameter. This name is exposed in the REST interface and in the Call Workflow node.
A description for the input parameter. The description is shown in the API specification of the REST interface.

ports.inPort: An optional input that is directly forwarded to the output of the node.
ports.outPort: The injected variables, default variables if none has been injected.
